Articles.Content:
Here's the error message:

(Filename:  Line: -1)

MissingFieldException: Field 'SolverEngines.ModuleEnginesSolver.actualThrottle' not found.
  at SolverEngines.ModuleEnginesSolver.FixedUpdate () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 


  at RealFuels.ModuleEnginesRF.FixedUpdate () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

This probably comes from the Stockalike Real Fuel configs. Engines won't fire after installing the mod.
Make sure you have the current versions of *both* RealFuels and SolverEngines.

Make sure you have the current versions of *both* RealFuels and SolverEngines.

Checked, installed, still not firing.

Can I just remove solver engines?

No. RF builds off SolverEngines; using RF without SolverEngines is rather like using RF without KSP, it won't load.

Try manually installing RF from here? https://github.com/NathanKell/ModularFuelSystem/releases/download/rf-v10.6.1/RealFuels_v10.6.1.zip

(Seriously, that issue you're reporting is due to a mismatched RF and SolverEngines, so clearly *something* is screwy in the install...)

No. RF builds off SolverEngines; using RF without SolverEngines is rather like using RF without KSP, it won't load.

Try manually installing RF from here? https://github.com/NathanKell/ModularFuelSystem/releases/download/rf-v10.6.1/RealFuels_v10.6.1.zip

(Seriously, that issue you're reporting is due to a mismatched RF and SolverEngines, so clearly *something* is screwy in the install...)

I'll try again.

Thanks for your help.
